title: Karesen Joshikousei to Tokikake Ojisan
original_name: 枯れ専女子高生と時かけおじさん
sinopse:
A 40-year-old businessman slips back in time to his youth! On the outside he is a young fit high school boy but inside, he is a model uncle. A nostalgic love story about a "time-traveling uncle" and a high school girl who loves his uncle-like appearance.

(Source: Kadokawa, translated)
